revisions.rev:
{{Infobox musical artist |name = Davis Cleveland |image = |caption = |background = solo_singer |birth_name = |birth_date = {{Birth date and age |2002|2|5}} |birth_place= [[Houston]], [[Texas]], U.S. |instrument = [[drums]] |genre = [[R&B]] |occupation = Actor, Model, Rapper, Singer |years_active = 2008âpresent |associated_acts = |label = |website = }} '''Davis Cleveland''' is an [[United States|American]] [[television]] [[actor]], [[rapper]] and [[singer]]. He is best known for his role as the mischievous little brother Flynn Jones on the [[Disney Channel]] original series ''[[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]]''. ==Career== Davis Cleveland was born on February 5th, 2002 . He began his acting career doing commercial work in [[Texas]].{{cite web|url=http://www.disneychannelmedianet.com/web/showpage/showpage.aspx?program_id=3129298&type=cleveland|title=Davis Cleveland is "Flynn Jones"|accessdate=2010-11-12|work= Medianet: Disney Channel}} After moving to [[Los Angeles]], he began appearing in national commercials for [[McDonalds]], [[Kmart]], [[Bing.com]], [[Nintendo]], [[Microsoft]], [[Nissan]], [[Bounty (brand)|Bounty]], [[General Mills]] Cereal, and [[Honey Baked Ham]]. Cleveland has guest-starred on numerous television shows including ''[[Hannah Montana]]'' as a Little Boy and a Little Boy at Funtopia Store, ''[[Pair of Kings]]'' as Chauncey, ''[[Good Luck Charlie]]'' as Flynn and a Ski Person, ''[[The Ghost Whisperer]]'' as Tyler Harmon, ''[[Desperate Housewives]]'' as Jeffrey, ''[[How I Met Your Mother]]'' as Andy,''[[Zeke and Luther]]'' as the younger brother of [[Adam Hicks]]'s character and ''[[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]]'' as the younger brother of CeCe Jones .{{cite web|url=http://weblogs.variety.com/on_the_air/2009/05/fox-fancy-footwork-for-200910.html|title=Fox: Fancy footwork for 2009-10 |accessdate=2011-03-25|work=Variety.com}}{{cite web|url=http://www.thefutoncritic.com/news/2010/05/21/disney-channel-orders-new-dance-filled-buddy-comedy-.series-shake-it-up-35807/20100521disney01/|title=Disney Channel Orders New Dance-Filled Buddy Comedy Series|accessdate=2011-03-25|work= TheFutonCritic.com}}{{cite web|url=http://www.tvguide.com/celebrities/davis-cleveland/credits/297540|title=Davis Cleveland - TVGuide|accessdate=2010-11-12|work= TVGuide.com}} In 2009, he had a starring role as Robby Gunderson in the [[television pilot|pilot]] for the [[Fox Broadcasting Company|FOX]] situation comedy ''[[Sons of Tucson#Recasting|Sons of Tucson]]''. Cleveland currently co-stars on the [[Disney Channel]] original series ''[[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]]'' as Flynn Jones, the precocious little brother of CeCe Jones ([[Bella Thorne]]).{{cite web|url=http://www.thefutoncritic.com/news/2010/05/21/disney-channel-orders-new-dance-filled-buddy-comedy-series-shake-it-up-35807/20100521disney01/|title=Disney Channel Orders New Dance-Filled Buddy Comedy Series|accessdate=2011-03-25|work= TheFutonCritic.com}}{{cite web|url=http://gogirlblog.de/shake-it-up/shake-it-up-stellt-vor-davis-cleveland/|title=Shake it up! stellt vor: Davis Cleveland|accessdate=2011-03-25|work=GoGirl.de}}{{cite web|url=http://www.variety.com/article/VR1118019667?refCatId=14&query=Davis+Cleveland|title=Disney Channel will 'Shake It Up' |accessdate=2011-03-25|work=Variety.com}} ==Personal life== Davis Cleveland was born February 5, 2002 in [[Houston, Texas]].{{cite web|url=http://weblogs.wpix.com/news/local/morningnews/blogs/2011/03/shake_it_up_cast.html|title=Disney's 'Shake It Up' Cast On New Show, Dancing |accessdate=2011-03-29|work=NY PIX Morning News}} Cleveland currently lives in [[Los Angeles, California|Los Angeles]] and enjoys studying [[martial arts]] and playing guitar, as well as other hobbies including video games, skateboarding and rollerblading. In March 2011, Cleveland told [[Tanya Rivero]] on ''[[Good Morning America]]'' of his experience working on ''[[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]]'' - "It's the best experience ever. It's like [[Disney World]] every morning."{{cite web|url=http://abcnews.go.com/GMA/video/gma-backstage-pass-shake-it-up-cast-13141008|title=Good Morning America: Backstage Pass: 'Shake It Up' Cast|accessdate=2011-03-27|work=ABCNews.com}} ==Filmography== {|class="wikitable" |- align="center" ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Year ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Show ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Role ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Notes |- |2010âpresent || ''[[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]]'' || [[Shake It Up (TV series)#Characters|Flynn Jones]] || [[Disney Channel Original Series]] |- | 2011 || ''[[Good Luck Charlie]]'' || Flynn Jones || [[List of Disney Channel crossovers|Crossover]] episode, "[[Charlie Shakes It Up]]" |- | 2011 || ''[[Good Luck Charlie]]'' ||Walker || Snow Show Part 2 |- | 2010-2011 || ''[[Zeke and Luther]]'' || Roy Waffles || [[Disney XD]] [[Original]] [[Series]]; Little Bro, Big Trouble & Sibling Rivalries |- | 2010 || ''[[Hannah Montana (season 4)|Hannah Montana Forever]]'' || Little Boy / Funtopia little boy ||two episodes |- | 2010 || ''[[Pair of Kings]]'' || Chauncey || [[Disney XD]] [[Original]] [[Series]]; Big Kings on Campus |- | 2009 || ''[[Ghost Whisperer]]'' || Tyler Harmon || [[List of Ghost Whisperer episodes#Season 5: 2009-2010|Episode: "Birthday Presence"]] |- | 2009 || ''[[Desperate Housewives]]'' || Jeffrey || [[American Broadcasting Company|ABC]] [[Original]] [[Series]] |- | 2008 || ''[[How I Met Your Mother]]'' || Andy || Episode ''[[The Fight (How I Met Your Mother)|The Fight]]'' |- | 2008 || ''[[Criminal Minds]]'' || Ricky || [[CBS Network]] [[Original]] [[Series]] |- |} == Discography == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Song !! Album !! Notes |- | 2011 || "Monster Mash" || Spooky Buddies || Song with [[Adam Irigoyen]] , [[Kenton Duty]] & [[Davis Cleveland]] |- |} ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="background:#b0c4de;"| Year ! style="background:#b0c4de;"| Award ! style="background:#b0c4de;"| Category ! style="background:#b0c4de;"| Role ! style="background:#b0c4de;"| Show/Film ! style="background:#b0c4de;"| Result ! style="background:#b0c4de;"| Ref. |- | 2011 |align=center|[[Young Artist Award]] |align=center|Outstanding Young Ensemble In a TV Series |align=center|Flynn Jones
(shared with [[Bella Thorne]], [[Zendaya]], [[Roshon Fegan]], [[Adam Irigoyen]], [[Kenton Duty]], [[Caroline Sunshine]]) |align=center|''[[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]]'' |{{nom}} |align=center|{{cite web|url=http://www.youngartistawards.org/noms32.html|title=32nd Annual Young Artist Awards|accessdate=2011-03-28|work=YoungArtistAwards.org}} |- |} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb name|3121911}} {{Persondata | NAME = Cleveland, Davis | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = February 5, 2002 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Houston]], [[Texas]], [[United States|U.S.A.]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Cleveland, Davis}} [[Category:2002 births]] [[Category:21st-century actors]] [[Category:Actors from Texas]] [[Category:American child actors]] [[Category:American television actors]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Houston, Texas]] [[de:Davis Cleveland]] [[es:Davis Cleveland]] [[fr:Davis Cleveland]] [[it:Davis Cleveland]] [[no:Davis Cleveland]] [[pl:Davis Cleveland]] [[pt:Davis Cleveland]] [[ro:Davis Cleveland]] [[fi:Davis Cleveland]]
